title: Boutique Lefkada Luxury Suites Minutes from Agios Nikitas Beach
description:
Escape to this exclusive hideaway on the shorefront of Lefkada, a hidden gem within Greece's Ionian Islands. Just minutes from the turquoise waters of the Ionian Sea, this pristine collection of just six sumptuous suites offers laidback luxury and stunning sea views. 

Tellion Suites is located in the charming coastal village of Agios Nikitas, a picturesque town with cobblestoned streets, whitewashed houses and a stunning crescent beach. While here, savour traditional Greek cuisine at the tavernas and cafes or take a short boat ride to the nearby islands of Milos and Kathisma.
